tokens.text: applies mob effects to nearby entities

generated_doNotEdit.title: Mob Effect
generated_doNotEdit.description: A component that applies a mob effect to entities that get within range.

fields.title: Ambient
fields.description: If the effect is considered an ambient effect (like the ones applied by Beacons or Conduits).

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Time in seconds to wait between each application of the effect.

fields.title: Effect Range
fields.description: How close a hostile entity must be to have the mob effect applied.

fields.title: Effect Time
fields.description: How long the applied mob effect lasts in seconds. Can also be set to "infinite"

fields.title: Entity Filter
fields.description: The set of entities that are valid to apply the mob effect to.

fields.title: Mob Effect
fields.description: The mob effect that is applied to entities that enter this entities effect range.
